Package code.games.hex.gameMechanics

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Rules
    Interface for Hex Rules
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameRunner
    The Controller for Hex.
    LoseByConnectingRules
    Weird way for a player to lose?
    Move
    Represents a player's move as a Point
    OverwriteMove
    Allows player to overwrite an opponents move.
    OverwriteRules
    Implements the Rules for an OverwriteMove
    StandardRules
    StandardRules implementation, every game will probably use this.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PlayerColor
    PlayerColor allows for three options, RED, BLUE, and BLANK.
